title: Banksy and spread of social protests

content.description:
Image 1

BRITISH GRAFFITI ARTIST BANKSY, SALE ENDS TODAY, PAINTING, CIRCA 2010

Rebecca Sapp / Contributor

Image 2

BRITISH GRAFFITI ARTIST BANKSY, I HATE MONDAYS, PAINTING, CIRCA 2010

Banksy, I Hate Mondays, 2009
content.question: Based on the images, Banksyâ€™s work best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The trend in modern art toward experimentation with abstract techniques and styles
The spread of social protests against the inequalities of global economic integration
The attainment of greater economic and political equality for women worldwide
The expansion of educational opportunities in developing African, Asian, and Latin American countries

content.answer: The spread of social protests against the inequalities of global economic integration

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
